params.name: name
params.description: Valid Values: a string with a length from 1 to 16384

params.name: desc
params.description: Valid Values: a string with a length from 0 to 16384

params.name: idOrganization
params.description: Valid Values: The id or name of the organization to add the board to.

params.name: prefs_permissionLevel
params.description: Valid Values: One of: 'org', 'private', 'public'

params.name: idBoard
params.description: Valid Values: id of the board that the member should be added to

params.name: email
params.description: Valid Values: An email address

params.name: fullName
params.description: Valid Values: A string with a length of at least 1. Cannot begin or end with a space.

params.name: type
params.description: Valid Values: One of admin, normal, observer

params.name: name
params.description: Valid Values: The name of the new card. It isn't required if the name is being copied from provided by a URL, file or card that is being copied.

params.name: desc
params.description: Valid Values: a string with a length from 0 to 16384

params.name: pos
params.description: Valid Values: A position. top, bottom, or a positive number.

params.name: due
params.description: Valid Values: A date, or null

params.name: idList
params.description: Valid Values: id of the list that the card should be added to

params.name: idMembers
params.description: Valid Values: A comma-separated list of objectIds, 24-character hex strings

params.name: idLabels
params.description: Valid Values: A comma-separated list of objectIds, 24-character hex strings

params.name: urlSource
params.description: Valid Values: A URL starting with http:// or https:// or null

params.name: fileSource
params.description: Valid Values: A file

params.name: idCardSource
params.description: Valid Values: The id of the card to copy into a new card.

params.name: keepFromSource
params.description: Valid Values: Properties of the card to copy over from the source.

params.name: name
params.description: Valid Values: a string with a length from 0 to 16384

params.name: idChecklist
params.description: Valid Values: id of the checklist that the item should be added to

params.name: pos
params.description: Valid Values: A position. top, bottom, or a positive number.

params.name: checked
params.description: Valid Values: true or false

params.name: name
params.description: Valid Values: a string with a length from 0 to 16384

params.name: pos
params.description: Valid Values: A position. top, bottom, or a positive number.

params.name: idCard
params.description: Valid Values: id of the card that the checklist should be added to

params.name: idChecklistSource
params.description: Valid Values: The id of the source checklist to copy into a new checklist.

params.name: name
params.description: Valid Values: a string with a length from 1 to 16384

params.name: idBoard
params.description: Valid Values: id of the board that the list should be added to

params.name: idListSource
params.description: Valid Values: The id of the list to copy into a new list.

params.name: pos
params.description: Valid Values: A position. top, bottom, or a positive number.

params.name: idBoard
params.description: Valid Values: id of the board that the list should be added to

params.name: cards
params.description: Valid Values: One of: all, closed, none, open, visible

params.name: filter
params.description: Valid Values: One of: all, closed, none, open

params.name: fields
params.description: Valid Values: all or a comma-separated list of: closed, idBoard, name, pos, subscribed

params.name: card_fields
params.description: Valid Values: all or a comma-separated list of card fields

params.name: idOrg
params.description: Valid Values: id of the organization to get the boards for

params.name: idOrg
params.description: Valid Values: id of the organization that the member should be added to

params.name: email
params.description: Valid Values: An email address

params.name: fullName
params.description: Valid Values: A string with a length of at least 1. Cannot begin or end with a space.

params.name: type
params.description: Valid Values: One of admin, normal
